post_message: Dr. Cornel West on the morally bankrupt DNC Platform: "There's no way for me, as a human being, a teacher & a citizen - if we can't say a word about TPP, if we can't talk about Medicare for All explicitly, if the greatest prophetic voice dealing with impending ecological catastrophe can hardly win a vote, & if we can't even acknowledge occupation as something that's real for a slice of humanity... there's no way in good conscience I could say 'take it to the next stage!'
